We took over Party Décor Hire in October 2023, marking an exciting new chapter for the business. Founded twenty years prior, Party Décor Hire has long been a staple in the Somerset West. We bring with us a wealth of fresh ideas and a renewed energy to propel the business forward.

Our relocation to a bigger shop (Shop 5) in Twin Oaks Centre on Main Road signals an exciting move to a big, vibrant new space where we are able to expand our equipment hiring and candle making business and include our amazing photo booths as well.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Alegreya Sans||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

As a team, we take pride in delivering friendly, personalized service. We strive to be not only helpful but also overflowing with creative décor ideas, aiming to alleviate the stress of event planning. Continuously expanding our product range and updating our in-house displays, we ensure our customers are presented with fresh, modern ideas for their occasions. With our combined experience and passion for event planning, flower arranging, candle making and photo booths, you can trust us to bring your dream event to life.

We eagerly anticipate the opportunity to meet you in person and assist you with your next event.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_video src=”https://youtu.be/rWphHGLF9nk?si=zaBwLf6JJHxhx3R_” “We used Party Decor Hire to help decorate the beautiful Lalapanzi Lodge for my sister’s wedding. Working with Party Decor Hire was fantastic, we managed to work everything out from the UK and on the big day and they brought the vision to life! Everything was Beautiful. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend working with them. Thank you for making such a special day that little bit more beautiful.”

– Beth Thomas UK

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”Alegreya Sans||||||||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on” sticky_enabled=”0″]

“Everything was delivered on time and collected timeously. I wouldn’t deal with any other company. Thank you so much for making my son’s 21st hassle-free.”

– Elizabeth
